page.title: 05Population Changes
page.content: Up until 50 years ago most people were employed in the village where they lived.Each village had its craftsmen providing goods and services for its people and local farms.Until about 10 years ago the population consisted mostly of people who even if they did not work on the land came from families with a rural background.Increasingly however longstanding families are being displaced by middle class newcomers who choose to live in the village to enjoy the advantages of country life and its pleasant relaxed atmosphere with opportunities for country pursuits. Once installed the newcomers often seek to restrict development in order to conserve the visual amenity of the area which has the effect of further raising property prices putting them out of the reach of many village families.
